Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory245.png'}
{3: 'Defense turrets bombard the battlefield. High-pitched laser rifle blasts punctuate the roar of assault rifles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Thirty degrees portside, fire!', 4: '1'}

{3: 'After making great sacrifices, Kowloong has finally stabilized the defensive line. However, just as Qu commands the troops to re-consolidate the line, a loud rumble is heard above the city gate.'}
{3: 'Qu turns to see several members of the Pulao Crew falling from the city gate. One of them lands among the Corrupted and is torn to pieces in an instant.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bian Crew', 3: "Leave this area to us, Lady Qu. Hurry, go see what's going on.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Handing over command, Qu rushes over to the closest Pulao soldier that fell.'}
{3: 'The Pulao Crew clear a way for Qu as she approaches.'}
{3: "The exoskeleton has managed to save the soldier's life. Qu wipes away the blood on the soldier's face."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'What happened up there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Injured Pulao Crew', 3: "An... enemy attack. She just... appeared out of nowhere... We couldn't react... fast enough.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I see. Inform the medics, then take him back to get healed.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu relays the order to the surrounding soldiers, then gets up and walks toward the gate. The fallen soldier stretches out his hand to Qu with his last strength.'}
{2: 'Injured Pulao Crew', 3: 'Lady Qu, be careful...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory249.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng Crew', 3: 'Lady Qu, you made it.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Qu reaches the top of the city gate, only to be greeted by the grim looks on the soldiers' faces. They are all training their rifles vigilantly on a single Corrupted, but no one is firing."}
{3: 'Parting the wall of soldiers, she sees the figure within.'}
{3: 'It is a most familiar face, that of the Chaofeng Crew Officer—Moyuan. Now Corrupted, her body is a mural of human blood and Corrupted oil. She appears to be murmuring nonsensically.'}
{3: 'After a moment of silence, Qu gives instructions to the soldiers around her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Return to the defensive line and prioritize defending against the main Corrupted forces. Leave her to me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Knowing what is to happen next, the soldiers quietly put away their weapons and file out of the city gate.'}
